text: Hi all. Hope you can help me. We are going to build a website for our client, preferable in HS CMS. But now they also want to integrate their webshop functionality in the new site (first Idea was to refer to the external webshop from the new website). They only sell a few books. Is a check-out even an option in HubSpot? Or do you suggest to go to Wordpress CMS instead? Thanks!
You can look into using Shopify lite and that can be integrated into HS CMS as it's a js implementation with add to cart buttons and a slide out cart
I have done used stripe and hubdb a while back to make a simple buy now. But it doesnt have a cart per se
